Pardon our dust. This website is not yet complete, but we're working on it and it should be done soon. In the meantime, please email covid@prex.io if you need PPE, can help create PPE, or if you'd like more information about what we're doing here!

Let's pool our resources.

These are crazy times. Sharing knowledge and resources is more important than ever.

Here is everything we think you might need or need to know about our efforts to create PPE.

Download the files and sign up so we can coordinate distribution!

Volunteer!

We need all the help we can get. Do you have the time and willingness to help out? Tell us your skills!

We are actively distributing shields to health care professionals on the front lines of this crisis. Tell us what you need.

Help us buy supplies

Every dollar you can spare helps us protect doctors, nurses, and others who are putting themselves at risk to keep us safe!
